message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product today for $18,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $15,000 is too low for me. How about $16,500?
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to increase my offer to $16,000. This is the highest amount I can afford for the product.
